quote: The only white man you can trust is a dead white man.
author: Robert Mugabe

quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
author: Stephen King

quote: The slogan was 'Don't trust anyone over thirty'. Sixty years later the slogan became, 'Don't trust anyone over ninety'.
author: John McCarthy

quote: I trust no one, not even myself.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: Trust instinct to the end, even though you can give no reason.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Every president has to live with the result of what Lyndon Johnson did with Vietnam, when he lost the trust of the American people in the presidency.
author: Robert Caro

quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Never trust a man who speaks well of everybody.
author: John Churton Collins

quote: Don't trust anyone over thirty.
author: Jerry Rubin

quote: Build a little fence of trust around today;  Fill the space with loving deeds,  And therein stay.  Look not through the sheltering bars  Upon tomorrow;  God will help thee bear what comes of joy and sorrow.
author: Mary F. Butts

quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
author: Golda Meir

quote: People come into your life and people leave it... you just have to trust that life has a road mapped out for you.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: Trust starts with truth and ends with truth.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: For every good reason there is to lie, there is a better reason to tell the truth.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Hard to trust honesty of inconsistent person.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends.
author: Eminem

quote: When a train goes through a tunnel and it gets dark, you don't throw away the ticket and jump off. You sit still and trust the engineer.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: In the beginning there was faith  which is childish trust  which is vain and illusion  which is dangerous.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Remember teamwork begins by building trust.  And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: I'm lucky to have a great support system in my friends and some of my family. If you have those people that you trust, go ahead and fall back into them and let them be your hammock and cocoon and let them embrace you.
author: JoJo

quote: All we know is what were told.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: I trusted you but now your words mean nothing to me, because your actions spoke the truth.
author: Author

quote: Trust is the first step to love.
author: Munshi Premchand

quote: It's good to trust others but, not to do so is much better.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the creator for all I have not seen.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Trust, but verify.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Not everyone can be trusted. I think we all have to be very selective about the people we trust.
author: Shelley Long

quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: A man trusts another man when he sees enough of himself in him.
author: Gregory David Roberts

quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: A body of men holding themselves accountable to nobody ought not to be trusted by anybody.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Trust thyself: every heart vibrates to that iron string.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I trust no one, not even myself.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: Honor bespeaks worth. Confidence begets trust. Service brings satisfaction. Cooperation proves the quality of leadership.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Quakers almost as good as colored. They call themselves friends and you can trust them every time.
author: Harriet Tubman

quote: We would be false to our trust if we allowed the time it takes to give effect to constitutional rights to be used as the very reason for taking away those rights.
author: Frank Murphy

quote: The trust of the people in the leaders reflects the confidence of the leaders in the people.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: Whatever happens in life is fine - just trust in that.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: A garden is a grand teacher. It teaches patience and careful watchfulness; it teaches industry and thrift; above all it teaches entire trust.
author: Gertrude Jekyll

quote: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: He who does not trust enough, Will not be trusted.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Sometimes you don't know who you can and cannot trust. I still learn that over and over again.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: Trust everybody, but cut the cards.
author: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: Suspicion is far more apt to be wrong than right; oftener unjust than just. It is no friend to virtue, and always an enemy to happiness.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: The senses deceive from time to time, and it is prudent never to trust wholly those who have deceived us even once.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: We have to compete in a universe of 200 networks, so we have to carve out our own niche, and to me, that niche is just basic shoe-leather journalism with some good journalists at the helm you can trust as presenters.
author: Walter Isaacson

quote: It's the same old story you've heard a thousand times. Somebody's trust gets broken. Somebody's left behind.
author: Travis Tritt

quote: We grow in time to trust the future for our answers.
author: Ruth Benedict

quote: I have made it a rule of my life to trust a man long after other people gave him up, but I don't see how I can ever trust any human being again.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: Old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
author: Athenaeus

quote: If we put our trust in the common sense of common men and 'with malice toward none and charity for all' go forward on the great adventure of making political, economic and social democracy a practical reality, we shall not fail.
author: Henry A. Wallace

quote: The trust that we put in ourselves makes us feel trust in others.
author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The Universe doesnt like secrets. It conspires to reveal the truth to lead you to it.
author: Lisa Unger

quote: I focus on the writing and let the rest of the process take care of itself. I've learned to trust my own instincts and I've also learned to take risks.
author: Sue Grafton

quote: Now I can do no more. We must trust to the Great Disposer of all events and the justice of our cause. I thank God for this opportunity of doing my duty.
author: Horatio Nelson

quote: Without trust there can be no genuine peace.  Neither in politics nor in the quiet individuality of the heart and spirit.
author: Timothy Zahn

quote: Trust not yourself, but your defects to know, make use of every friend and every foe.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Men are able to trust one another, knowing the exact degree of dishonesty they are entitled to expect.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: The Administrations willingness to consistently abandon the truth has done great damage. Americans are less willing to listen less likely to trust or take anything that is said in Washington seriously.
author: John Kerry

quote: This world of ours... must avoid becoming a community of dreadful fear and hate, and be, instead, a proud confederation of mutual trust and respect.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Teachability and trust always leads to total obedience.
author: Ed Townsend

quote: The betrayal of trust carries a heavy taboo.
author: Aldrich Ames

quote: It's difficult to get started-when it comes to dealing with an unknown quantity, people are reluctant to trust their own opinion. It helps if two or three people give you a boost.
author: Lyle Lovett

quote: Whoever has trusted a woman has trusted deceivers.
author: Hesiod

quote: Someone who thinks the world is always cheating him is right. He is missing that wonderful feeling of trust in someone or something.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: If you don't trust someone to look after your investments, then they shouldn't be doing the job for you.
author: Murray Walker

quote: It doesn't make any sense... that's why I trust it!
author: Kate Winslet

quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The future which we hold in trust for our own children will be shaped by our fairness to other people's children.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work.
author: Warren G. Bennis

quote: I have in sincerity pledged myself to your service, as so many of you are pledged to mine. Throughout all my life and with all my heart I shall strive to be worthy of your trust.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: I just trust people and they sense everything's gonna be alright.
author: Gregory Corso

quote: The deep roots never doubt spring will come.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: When a man assumes a public trust he should consider himself a public property.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Something goes wrong, I yell at them -Fix it- whether it's their fault or not. You can only really yell at the players you trust.
author: Bill Parcells

quote: The moment for action has arrived, and I know that I can trust in you to save our country.
author: George B. McClellan

quote: Jim Bakker came along. He said, Jessica Hahn, listen. You're a virgin. As God as my witness. He said, We need a girl that we can trust.
author: Jessica Hahn

quote: Self-trust is the essence of heroism.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: I buy about $1,500 worth of papers every month. Not that I trust them. I'm looking for the crack in the fabric.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: She knew how to trust people... a rare quality, revealing a character far above average.
author: Cardinal Jean Francois de Retz

quote: We trust something in a grocery store and assume it's good. We don't learn about the most precious thing in life-the food we put in our body. Educate yourself!
author: Paul Prudhomme

quote: I never trust a fighting man who doesnt smoke or drink.
author: William Halsey

quote: Trust is a great force multiplier.
author: Tom Ridge

quote: I wouldn't trust any man as far as you can throw a piano.
author: Ethel Merman

quote: I shall endeavour still further to prosecute this inquiry, an inquiry I trust not merely speculative, but of sufficient moment to inspire the pleasing hope of its becoming essentially beneficial to mankind.
author: Edward Jenner

quote: Americans have the right and advantage of being armed - unlike the citizens of other countries whose governments are afraid to trust the people with arms.
author: James Madison

quote: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
author: Solon

quote: If you wish in this world to advance your merits you're bound to enhance; You must stir it and stump it, and blow your own trumpet, Or, trust me, you haven't a chance.
author: William Gilbert

quote: You can't trust anybody with power.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: I said tonight I wanted to talk to you about love. Look into your hearts. This is our country. This is our future. These are our children and grandchildren. You can trust Mitt.
author: Ann Romney

quote: I get along with guys; most of my friends are guys. It's easier to trust men sometimes. I only have a few close girlfriends that I trust.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: A blessed thing it is for any man or woman to have a friend, one human soul whom we can trust utterly, who knows the best and worst of us, and who loves us in spite of all our faults.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: In spite of the haze of speculation, it is still something of a shock to find myself here, coming to terms with an enormous trust placed in my hands and with the inevitable sense of inadequacy that goes with that.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: I never trust an executive who tends to pass the buck. Nor would I want to deal with him as a customer or a supplier.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: We believe. We believe in our destiny as a nation. We believe we have been called to do good, to spread the blessings of liberty and encourage the sense of trust upon which free societies depend.
author: Tony Snow

quote: People ask me why is it so hard to trust people. I ask them why is it hard to keep a promise.
author: Author

quote: I have made it a rule of my life to trust a man long after other people gave him up, but I don't see how I can ever trust any human being again.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.

author: Athenaeus

quote: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: I buy about $1,500 worth of papers every month. Not that I trust them. I'm looking for the crack in the fabric.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: She knew how to trust people... a rare quality, revealing a character far above average.
author: Cardinal Jean Francois de Retz

quote: We trust something in a grocery store and assume it's good. We don't learn about the most precious thing in life-the food we put in our body. Educate yourself!
author: Paul Prudhomme

quote: I never trust a fighting man who doesnt smoke or drink.
author: William Halsey

quote: Trust is a great force multiplier.
author: Tom Ridge

quote: I wouldn't trust any man as far as you can throw a piano.
author: Ethel Merman

quote: I shall endeavour still further to prosecute this inquiry, an inquiry I trust not merely speculative, but of sufficient moment to inspire the pleasing hope of its becoming essentially beneficial to mankind.
author: Edward Jenner

quote: Americans have the right and advantage of being armed - unlike the citizens of other countries whose governments are afraid to trust the people with arms.
author: James Madison

quote: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
author: Solon

quote: If you wish in this world to advance your merits you're bound to enhance; You must stir it and stump it, and blow your own trumpet, Or, trust me, you haven't a chance.
author: William Gilbert

quote: You can't trust anybody with power.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: I said tonight I wanted to talk to you about love. Look into your hearts. This is our country. This is our future. These are our children and grandchildren. You can trust Mitt.
author: Ann Romney

quote: I get along with guys; most of my friends are guys. It's easier to trust men sometimes. I only have a few close girlfriends that I trust.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: A blessed thing it is for any man or woman to have a friend, one human soul whom we can trust utterly, who knows the best and worst of us, and who loves us in spite of all our faults.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: In spite of the haze of speculation, it is still something of a shock to find myself here, coming to terms with an enormous trust placed in my hands and with the inevitable sense of inadequacy that goes with that.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: I never trust an executive who tends to pass the buck. Nor would I want to deal with him as a customer or a supplier.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: We believe. We believe in our destiny as a nation. We believe we have been called to do good, to spread the blessings of liberty and encourage the sense of trust upon which free societies depend.
author: Tony Snow

quote: People ask me why is it so hard to trust people. I ask them why is it hard to keep a promise.
author: Author

quote: I have made it a rule of my life to trust a man long after other people gave him up, but I don't see how I can ever trust any human being again.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: Old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
author: Athenaeus

quote: If we put our trust in the common sense of common men and 'with malice toward none and charity for all' go forward on the great adventure of making political, economic and social democracy a practical reality, we shall not fail.
author: Henry A. Wallace

quote: The trust that we put in ourselves makes us feel trust in others.
author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The Universe doesnt like secrets. It conspires to reveal the truth to lead you to it.
author: Lisa Unger

quote: I focus on the writing and let the rest of the process take care of itself. I've learned to trust my own instincts and I've also learned to take risks.
author: Sue Grafton

quote: Now I can do no more. We must trust to the Great Disposer of all events and the justice of our cause. I thank God for this opportunity of doing my duty.
author: Horatio Nelson

quote: Without trust there can be no genuine peace.  Neither in politics nor in the quiet individuality of the heart and spirit.
author: Timothy Zahn

quote: Trust not yourself, but your defects to know, make use of every friend and every foe.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Men are able to trust one another, knowing the exact degree of dishonesty they are entitled to expect.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: The Administrations willingness to consistently abandon the truth has done great damage. Americans are less willing to listen less likely to trust or take anything that is said in Washington seriously.
author: John Kerry

quote: This world of ours... must avoid becoming a community of dreadful fear and hate, and be, instead, a proud confederation of mutual trust and respect.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Teachability and trust always leads to total obedience.
author: Ed Townsend

quote: The betrayal of trust carries a heavy taboo.
author: Aldrich Ames

quote: It's difficult to get started-when it comes to dealing with an unknown quantity, people are reluctant to trust their own opinion. It helps if two or three people give you a boost.
author: Lyle Lovett

quote: Whoever has trusted a woman has trusted deceivers.
author: Hesiod

quote: Someone who thinks the world is always cheating him is right. He is missing that wonderful feeling of trust in someone or something.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: If you don't trust someone to look after your investments, then they shouldn't be doing the job for you.
author: Murray Walker

quote: It doesn't make any sense... that's why I trust it!
author: Kate Winslet

quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The future which we hold in trust for our own children will be shaped by our fairness to other people's children.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work.
author: Warren G. Bennis

quote: I have in sincerity pledged myself to your service, as so many of you are pledged to mine. Throughout all my life and with all my heart I shall strive to be worthy of your trust.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: I just trust people and they sense everything's gonna be alright.
author: Gregory Corso

quote: The deep roots never doubt spring will come.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: When a man assumes a public trust he should consider himself a public property.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Something goes wrong, I yell at them -Fix it- whether it's their fault or not. You can only really yell at the players you trust.
author: Bill Parcells

quote: The moment for action has arrived, and I know that I can trust in you to save our country.
author: George B. McClellan

quote: Jim Bakker came along. He said, Jessica Hahn, listen. You're a virgin. As God as my witness. He said, We need a girl that we can trust.
author: Jessica Hahn

quote: Self-trust is the essence of heroism.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

author: Joyce Brothers

author: Dick Gregory

author: Cardinal Jean Francois de Retz

author: Solon

author: Charles Kingsley
